channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Cars parked on pavement, 21st December
item.description:
Cars are parked on the pavement roughly 10 cars, causing issues for baby buggies to pass by. Safety issue for people to walk by.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southover, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of litter on street, in gutters and on pavement, 21st December
item.description:
On Mooreland Road there is a lot of litter everywhere. This is an ongoing problem and it is particularly bad after the refuse collection day. This might be linked to problems with bins and bin lids going missing in this area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Mooreland Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture dumped, 21st December
item.description:
Furniture which appears to be some sofa's and seats/cushions were dumped approximately 23:45-00:00 Saturday 20th December. These have been dumped at the end of Malpas road against railings which back off to the railway line. This is a hazard. Please deal.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Malpas Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of rubbish abandoned overnight, 21st December
item.description:
Guests at the church hall last night abandoned their rubbish against the property across the street. This is another incident as the hall does not provide proper rubbish disposal. Normally residents just deal with it but this is a lot of rubbish

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albany Road, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
